document.full_text: chinese sports fans were toasting li na on saturday as she became the country's first tennis player to win a grand slam singles title, a triumph described as "miracle" by state media.
document.title: china's "golden flower" li stuns fans back home
lines_and_colors: chinese sports fans were toasting li na on saturday as she became the country's first tennis player to win a grand slam singles title, a triumph described as "miracle" by state media.
